B

ball - Class in a11rallypong
The ball class creates a ball that moves around on the screen and is hit back and forth between two paddles.
ball(int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class a11rallypong.ball
The base constructor takes in four values to setup the items on the screen in their designated spots.
base - Class in a11rallypong
The base class is an abstract class that holds the essential methods and values to be inherited by the ball and paddle classes.
base(int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class a11rallypong.base
The base constructor takes in four values to setup the items on the screen in their designated spots.
bounceOnX() - Method in class a11rallypong.ball
The bounceOnX method is called whenever the ball hits a paddle.
bounceOnX() - Method in class a11rallypong.base
An abstract method which is called when the object is to reverse its x velocity.
bounceOnX() - Method in class a11rallypong.paddle
bounceOnX is unused in this class
bounceOnY() - Method in class a11rallypong.ball
The bounceOnY method is called whenever the ball comes in contact with the top or bottom of the screen, it simply inverts the balls y velocity.
bounceOnY() - Method in class a11rallypong.base
An abstract method which is called when the object is to reverse its y velocity.
bounceOnY() - Method in class a11rallypong.paddle
bounceOnY is unused in this class
